metadata.name: Kyoto Warriors #1
metadata.description: The Kyoto Warriors is a manga inspired NFT project. The total supply is a limited 2000 NFTs. The NFTs are all characters involved in the manga which the Kyoto Warriors are producing. The manga is one of many which the team will be putting out online on manga reading sites. The holders of the NFT will be first exclusive enjoyers of everything which is produced by the KW brand.
